sql.isNotEmpty: u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NO) like upper('%'||#PRD_NO#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_NAME) like upper('%'||#PRD_NAME#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)
u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID in (select a.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL a where upper(a.PRD_SPEC) like upper('%'||#PRD_SPEC#||'%') and a.DEL_FLAG=0)

sqlMap.sql: select u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_ID, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_FINISH_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_FINISH_DATE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DELIVER_ADDR_ID, u.DELIVER_ADDR_NO, u.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt FROM ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u

select u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_ID, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NO, u.REPAIR_CHANN_NAME, u.AREA_ID, u.AREA_NO, u.AREA_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_FINISH_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_FINISH_DATE, u.STOREOUT_STORE_ID, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NO, u.STOREOUT_STORE_NAME, u.STORAGE_FLAG, u.REMARK, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DELIVER_ADDR_ID, u.DELIVER_ADDR_NO, u.DELIVER_DTL_ADDR, u.DEL_FLAG from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER u where u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#
sqlMap.sql: select u.REPAIR_ORDER_DTL_ID, u.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID, u.PRD_ID, u.PRD_NO, u.PRD_NAME, u.PRD_SPEC, u.PRD_COLOR, u.BRAND, u.STD_UNIT, u.REPAIR_NUM, u.REPAIR_PRICE, u.REPAIR_AMOUNT, u.REPAIR_RESON, u.REPAIR_ATT, u.DEL_FLAG, u.VOLUME, u.TOTAL_VOLUME, s.SPCL_TECH_ID, s.SPCL_TECH_FLAG, p.PAR_PRD_NAME from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_DTL u left join DRP_SPCL_TECH s on u.SPCL_TECH_ID = s.SPCL_TECH_ID left join BASE_PRODUCT p on u.PRD_ID = p.PRD_ID
sqlMap.update:
update ${SYSSCHEMA}.ERP_REPAIR_ORDER
STATE = #STATE# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME#
, UPD_TIME = sysdate where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID = #ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID#

insert into T_SYS_MESSAGE(MESSAGEID,SENDID,SENDER,MSGINFO,SENDTIME,RECEIVEID,RECEIVER) select SYS_GUID(),#SENDID#,#SENDER#,'您好：有一个返修单：'||ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_NO||'，等待发货！',sysdate, tmp.XTYHID,tmp.XM from ERP_REPAIR_ORDER a left join (select c.XTYHID,c.ZTXXID,d.CHANN_ID,e.XM from T_SYS_JSQX a ,T_SYS_XTYHJS b ,T_SYS_XTYH c, BASE_USER_CHANN_CHRG d ,T_SYS_RYXX e where a.XTJSID=b.XTJSID and b.XTYHID=c.XTYHID and c.XTYHID=d.USER_ID and c.RYXXID=e.RYXXID and a. XTMKID='BS0011701' and c.YHZT='启用') tmp on a.Repair_Chann_Id=tmp.CHANN_ID where ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID=#ERP_REPAIR_ORDER_ID# and tmp.XTYHID is not null
